thread.title: In-form Mahatma Otoo scores brace again as Sogndal edges closer to title in Norwegian second tier
thread.title_full: In-form Mahatma Otoo scores brace again as Sogndal edges closer to title in Norwegian second tier

title: In-form Mahatma Otoo scores brace again as Sogndal edges closer to title in Norwegian second tier
text:
Sports News | 22 October 2015 00:55 CET In-form Mahatma Otoo scores brace again as Sogndal edges closer to title in Norwegian second tier - www.ghanasoccernet.com Otoo scored his second brace in three days on Wednesday 
Ghana striker Mahatama Otoo extended his impressive scoring form by hitting a brace to help Sogndal go closer to clinching the Norwegian second tier title with a vital 4-3 win over Kristiansund on Wednesday. 
The 23-year-old who scored twice just three days ago got his side off to a good started by heading in a 7 th minute cross. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Reliance on the Ghana Armed Forces, instead of a just governance, will always be the wrong policy . By: Adwoa Ayamba
